name: Simple Multipliers
description:
Simple Multipliers is a unique idle game with various gameplay mechanics and possibilities.

You start with only one generator which produces passive income. Use a profit it makes to improve its power and buy multiplier points. Spend them for powerful upgrades which significantly boost your generator. Or use them to unlock even more powerful prestige upgrades. Multiply multipliers, unlock new generators, complete the game! It's up to you what to do!

Features:
  • Simple but addictive gameplay with various possibilities
  • Multipliers and prestige systems with unique upgrades
  • Everything can be multiplied! Even multipliers themselves!
  • Hardcore but achievable endgame goals
  • Cute minimalistic UI
  • Calm ambient music for your relaxation
  • Steam achievements and global ranking system

Simple Multipliers is a not as simple game as it seems at the beginning. But you will definitely have fun playing it if you give it a chance!
